title: Can I get a reroll of my shop?
body:
https://imgur.com/a/jE2aB
I don't play any of these champs cept blitz.

replies.body: It sucks you didn't like the deals you were offered, the items in 'Your Shop' can't be rerolled just for that.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=N187QpK9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-15T03:48:30.243+0000)
>
> It sucks you didn't like the deals you were offered, the items in 'Your Shop' can't be rerolled just for that.

But I haven't played these champs in days, even weeks! but I play blitz almost daily, and there is only one skin for him.
